artefact.overview: To run a freshwater land-based fish farm in Northern Ireland, the farm must be licenced by the Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD)
artefact.licence_short_description: Register as a freshwater land-based fish farm in Northern Ireland with the Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD).
artefact.licence_overview:
To run a freshwater land-based fish farm in Northern Ireland, the farm must be licenced by the [Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD).](http://www.dardni.gov.uk/ "Department of Agriculture and Rural Development "){:rel="external"}

*[DARD]: Department of Agriculture and Rural Development
